page.title: 08Stratford Bridge
page.content: Garage, Caravan dealership, Permanent caravan park. Derivation- Bridge over brook which divides Gloucestershire from Worcestershire on the A38 north of Tewkesbury. Garage offers petrol, cold drinks and sweets. Owner mechanic services local cars, very busy in summer with holiday breakdowns. 24 hour breakdown service, on call with AA within a 10 mile radius. Most calls are to cars on the M5 and M50. Finds meeting regular committment difficult when called out during day and night, but business too erratic to employ two full time machanics. Next to permanent residential caravan site occupied by 60 owner caravans, and small caravan dealership/shop offering accessories, including calor gas, to caravanners, carrying a varied stock of caravans small and large attracting prospective purchasers from a wide area.
